title: First Computer Build
imageAlt: Young me in front of first computer post
description: Here is where it all started! This is my first build when I was 11 years old in 2014.

title: Current Computer Build
imageAlt: Me proudly posing in front of first post of new system
description: I previously built this computer in 2018, but here I am giving it a much needed upgrade! Inside, it packs a Ryzen 5 9600x, 32gb of DDR5 ram, and a 2tb NVME drive!

title: Plex Media Server Build
imageAlt: Me standing in front of a computer
description: My mom wanted something better than her laptop to store and steam movies, so I used some spare parts to build her a server.

title: Motorized Bicycle Build
imageAlt: A bicycle with an engine kit installed
description: Aside from computers, I also enjoy some mechanical work. This bike could get up to 40mph! I built this during the Covid lockdowns in 2020.

title: JavaScript Game
imageAlt: Young me in front of first computer post
description: A game I made for a school project to test reaction time!

title: Code Academy Profile
description: My profile on Code Academy showcasing my completed courses and skills.
